sik.client.user.services
Class ClientIOServices

java.lang.Object
  sik.client.user.services.ClientIOServices
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class ClientIOServices
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable

Class used for text file IO services. One text file contains attributes values and settings to be used by other classes so that these settings can be changed by simply changing the values in the text file, rather than having to hard code the attribute values or keep prompting the user for an input. The second text file provides the same functionality but contains a legend to the campus map used in this student information kiosk system

Author:
Jamie Brindle (06352322) - Manchester Metropolitan University
